CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in LOC .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an enforcement action before ORG ( PERSON ) against a socially / State - owned company “ ORG a.d . Smederevo ” ( the debtor ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE that court ordered direct enforcement of the outstanding invoice ( izvršenje na osnovu verodostojne isprave ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the restructuring of the debtor as part of privatisation process .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were stayed because the debtor was undergoing restructuring .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant appealed the decision to stay the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ’s appeal was rejected by the enforcement court .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant urged the court to continue the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the court informed the applicant that the debtor was still undergoing restructuring and that therefore the enforcement proceedings could not be continued .
CARDINAL . It would appear that the applicant did not appeal against this decision .
